examples: Thus far of Military furniture of defence, pertaining to men. Now shall be touched such things as belong to Horses of service for the field; though some of them are in common for other Horses. Of the first sort, are the Shafron, the Cranet, and the Bard, whereof I find no particular examples of Bearing single and apart, but as they are borne conjunct in the totall furniture of Horses for the Field,  [â€¦]
